Isla Rose Life Flight Act
A bill to preserve State authority to regulate air carriers providing air ambulance service.
Isla Rose Life Flight Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Isla Rose Life Flight Act
This bill provides that statutory provisions prohibiting state or local governments from enacting or enforcing a law or regulation relating to a price, route, or service of an air carrier shall not apply to a state or local law or regulation governing network participation, reimbursement and balance billing, or transparency for an air carrier providing air ambulance services.
